name: Ghost Launcher
description:
Entry for LOWREZJAM 2020.

Also a bit of a web assembly experiment. If the browser version doesn't play then a Windows version can be downloaded in the zip file below, just unzip and run the exe in the folder.

Best run in full screen - press 'F' to toggle.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move.
  • A and Z to go up / down, speed up / slow down and launch and land on station pads.
  • SPACE to fire.
  • SHIFT + left and right arrows to strafe.
  • M for map (and also ESC on Windows), M again to leave map.
  • In stations, SPACE for next text or 1-4 for options as indicated.
